plugins.name: omnimind-engine
plugins.description: Recursive capability amplification engine with 4 agents (synthesizer, ramanujan, vonneumann, davinci), 2 commands (/amplify, /explode), 2 skills, and 1 hook for pattern compounding

plugins.name: dialectic-engine
plugins.description: Intelligence amplification through adversarial synthesis. Three agents (adversary, advocate, arbiter) implement Hegelian dialectic: thesis → antithesis → synthesis. Every idea emerges stronger.
